name: Size-Changing
description: Can recruit/fight for 2 less if you play a specific card type this turn

name: Divided Card
description: Choose which side of the card to play on your turn. While the card is in your hand, you may use both classes/teams for other cards you have already played this turn.

name: Phasing
description: Can swap Phasing card with the top card of your deck.

name: One-Time Use
description: After playing this card you must return it to the bottom of its original pile.

name: Hyperspeed
description: Reveal the top X cards of your deck to get +1 Attack for each card that can attack.

name: Dark Memories
description: Get +1 Attack for each hero class in your discard pile (i.e. covert, range, etc.).

name: Last Stand
description: Get +1 Attack for each empty space in the city.

name: Switcheroo
description: Can discard the card to put a hero of the specified printed cost from the HQ into your hand.

name: Investigate
description: Draw the top 2 cards from your deck and keep any with the specified thing (i.e. attack, recruit, team, etc.).

name: Teleport
description: Instead of playing the card, you can add it to y our hand next round as an extra card.

name: Spectrum
description: Can only use Spectrum ability if you have at least 3 different classes (i.e. covert, range, etc.) in your hand.

name: Patrol
description: Can only use Patrol ability if specified city space is empty before you play the card, not after.

name: Wall-Crawl
description: When you recruit this hero, put them on top of your deck instead of into your discard pile.

name: Cross-Dimensional Rampage
description: Each player reveals a X hero or a X card in their Victory Pile or gains a wound.

name: Worthy
description: Can only use Worthy ability if you have a Hero that costs 5 or more in your hand.

name: Conqueror
description: Gain +X Attack bonus while a Villain occupies the indicated city space.

name: Artifact
description: When first played, keep it front of your to potentially use on any future or current turn. You can 'throw' an artifact to the bottom of your deck to use the indicated ability.

name: Villains You Gain as Heroes
description: When you fight this villain you gain it as a hero. If a card effect wants to know their cost, use their old Villain Attack value
